
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

These are optional third party tools (eventually used by AudioVideocours for some features),
please read carefully about their license before using them.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


* JWPlayer for Flash (for non commercial use):
http://www.jeroenwijering.com/?item=JW_FLV_Media_Player
Licence: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/
(for commercial use you have to buy a licence)

* swfobject.js
http://code.google.com/p/swfobject/
MIT License

* mp3splt.exe (command line tool)
http://mp3splt.sourceforge.net/mp3splt_page/home.php
GPL v2 License

More informations about AudiVideoCours project here:
http://audiovideocours.u-strasbg.fr
https://sites.google.com/site/audiovideocours/
